$schema.description: URL to the JSON schema for this type of file. This is used by editors to validate and annotate the data.

rss.description: A URL to a RSS feed. Used for loading news.

clientId.description: Client ID for the Application registered with Discord.

smallImageKey.description: Name of the uploaded image for the small profile artwork.

discord.description: Global settings for Discord Rich Presence.

meta.description: Distribution metadata to be forwarded to the distribution file.
